com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao

Class HallDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao.HallDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HallDao

    @ApplicationScoped
public class HallDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements HallDao
    The class HallDaoImpl contains all the methods implementation to query the Halls table. It contains the basic CRUD methods and additional methods that were needed. This class implements the HallDao interface
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
